data.message: Lost my Respect Man. I dont care about Trump or politics but you just behave like kid. never drag politics into your Rap

replies.message: A person can't talk about politics in music wow... that is the most unamerican thing I have heard today but Its still early I guess
Dawg Eminem has been talking about politics in his music for years 😂😂😂 you're late af
Have you heard his song Mosh before or white america? You must be a newer fan
Politics have been part of his lyrics since clinton. Some "fan" you are
Tyler Allen Schmidt talking about social issues like in his Rap "White America" and openly dissing a president.
You must of been listening to the edited version if you didn't know Em rapped politcs
Kaviraj Kalsi wouldn't need to openly diss a president if he didn't give us any reason too 🤷🏽‍♂️🤷🏽‍♂️

"You want me to fix up lyrics while the president gets his dick sucked" hes always talked about politics when you have a platform you speak out again things you don't like retard sheep are the only ones who wouldn't want that

maybe I am wrong but I feel these Rappers and most of US celebs were and are supporting Hillary. Although I am not from USA but there is a difference between pointing out fouls in society and trying to eliminate a option in Democracy. 
Although a Pres. cannot change much in USA as in democracy one single person is just there to represent his country and do visits. he cannot change much alone.
Whaaaat? The rap started in Jamaica talking about politics, looser!

White America ( The Eminem Show, 2002) . Totally not a political song. If you don't wanna support Eminem then do what he told you to do, fuck off. What are you doing on his Facebook page like 2 weeks after  all this shit?
SINCE WHEN HAS HE EVER BEHAVED THE WAY SOCIETY WANTED HIM TO BEHAVE? Get out lmao
Have you ever listened to Eminem? White America is a good place to start. Plus don't blame him when there is a complete and utter twat running the place.
Fuck you leave trump supporting shit stain
Never drag politics into your rap? Do you even know who eminem is? Dafuq?

You’re saying a rapper who us to talk about moms spaghetti 🍝 who’s name is eminem  is acting like a KID??? Yet the so-called President right now is acting like a toddler but he’s still holding office shouldn’t that offend you more???
I could be one of your kids... White americaaaa bwhahah😁😂

He has always been this way in the first place.
What's your point😂😂😂?
Kaviraj Kalsi Trump is a foul in society
Hip-Hop has always had a political element. Never listened to Public Enemy or NWA?
Like he gives a fuck. Byeee we won't miss you 👋
He's always done that dumbass...shows you're no true fan
Politics have always been part of his rap. You've never been a fan. Fuck off and unfollow his page.

Bruh politics and rap go hand in hand, maybe not that billboard top 40 shit you listen to but real rap. Also I find it hella ironic that a white dude is taking a stand for minorities across the nation and your first thought is to shit on him on an ad that's not even about him
